R

readFile(String) - Static method in class Battleships.Utils.TextIO
Opens a file with a specified name for input.
readLineFromServer() - Method in class Battleships.Controllers.ClientController
Reads and returns one line from the server.
readStandardInput() - Static method in class Battleships.Utils.TextIO
After this method is called, input will be read from standard input (as it is in the default state).
readStream(InputStream) - Static method in class Battleships.Utils.TextIO
After this method is called, input will be read from inputStream, provided it is non-null.
readStream(Reader) - Static method in class Battleships.Utils.TextIO
After this method is called, input will be read from inputStream, provided it is non-null.
readUserSelectedFile() - Static method in class Battleships.Utils.TextIO
Puts a GUI file-selection dialog box on the screen in which the user can select an input file.
ROWS - Static variable in class Battleships.Models.ProtocolMessages
Array of valid row numbers.
run() - Method in class Battleships.Controllers.ClientController
Calls a method to create a connection with the server and send the handshake Checks if returned handshake message means that a game can start or the ClientController needs to wait for a new opponent.
run() - Method in class Battleships.Server.GameClientHandler
Continuously listens to client input and forwards the input to the handleCommand method.
run() - Method in class Battleships.Server.GameTimer
gives the GameClientHandlers a time update of the game every second.
run() - Method in class Battleships.Server.Server
Continuously waits for a socket willing to connect.
